# publish.setup_github_pages { #stlitepack.publish.setup_github_pages }

```python
publish.setup_github_pages(
    mode='gh-actions',
    use_docs=True,
    only_on_index=True,
    branch='main',
)
```

Set up GitHub Pages deployment for a stlite app.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name          | Type                   | Description                                                                                                                                                    | Default        |
|---------------|------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------|
| mode          | (gh - actions, manual) | Deployment mode. - "gh-actions": Use a `gh-pages` branch with GitHub Actions. - "manual": Deploy directly from `main` branch (manual Pages settings required). | `"gh-actions"` |
| use_docs      | bool                   | If True, serve from the `docs/` folder. Otherwise serve from the repo root.                                                                                    | `True`         |
| only_on_index | bool                   | If True, trigger deployment only when `index.html` changes (gh-pages mode only).                                                                               | `True`         |
| branch        | str                    | Branch to use as source. Defaults to main.                                                                                                                     | `'main'`       |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type         | Description                                                                                     |
|--------|--------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | Path or None | Path to created workflow file (gh-pages mode), or Path to helper instructions file (main mode). |
